tasks.label: ruff
tasks.command: source ${HOME}/.zshrc; conda activate base; ruff check --fix ${file}; ruff format ${file}

tasks.label: git-sync
tasks.command: git fetch origin --prune && (git fetch origin main:main 2>/dev/null; true)

tasks.label: git-rebase-onto-main
tasks.command: git stash push -q -m 'git-rebase-auto' --include-untracked; tagfile=$(mktemp); for t in $(git tag --merged HEAD --no-merged main 2>/dev/null); do printf '%s\t%s\n' "$t" "$(git log -1 --format='%s' "$t")" >> "$tagfile"; done; git rebase main; while IFS=$'\t' read -r tag subj; do new=$(git log --format='%H' -F --grep="$subj" -1 main..HEAD 2>/dev/null); [ -n "$new" ] && git tag -f "$tag" "$new"; done < "$tagfile"; rm -f "$tagfile"; git stash list | head -1 | grep -q 'git-rebase-auto' && git stash pop -q
